description: Try our easy to follow Ham & Mushroom Omelette recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Ham & Mushroom Omelette Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 tbs reducedfat milk (standard milk can be used)

recipeInstructions.text: Spray a nonstick frying pan with oil spray and cook onion, capsicum and mushrooms together over medium heat until softened. Transfer to a bowl. Add parsley, ham and season with pepper.
In a jug, whisk eggs and egg whites together with milk.

Reheat pan and spray again with oil. Pour in half of the egg mixture and tilt pan to coat base evenly. As the edges set, lift with a spatula to allow uncooked egg to run underneath. Cook for 1 minute. Scatter over half the ham mixture and cheese.

Carefully lift one edge of the omelette with a spatula and fold over to enclose filling. Slide out onto a serving plate and cut in half. Repeat process with remaining egg mixture and ham mixture. Serve.
